text: Hey Keith! No worries. Now I'm late replying! Ye I've got a constraint system with some clumping and grouping to try to vary the size. The whole building is fractured in fact, so the shape left behind is a result of the constraints. I take your point though, I'll go back to it and try to force the size variation a bit. Ye I'm not sure about the helicopter, it was good for learning hard constraints. Both are tutorials so they won't go in my reel.
I have a couple of other projects on the go. I'm doing a shot of a football being torn apart.
